Title: Relates to the real property tax exemption for un-remarried spouses of volunteer firefighters or volunteer ambulance workers killed in the line of duty
Summary: Amends the real property tax exemption for un-remarried spouses of volunteer firefighters or volunteer ambulance workers killed in the line of duty to permit continuation of such exemption for volunteer members with service between two and five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a real property tax exemption for un-remarried spouses of volunteer firefighters or volunteer ambulance workers killed in the line of duty
